title: LG 30 Cu. Ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator LMX30995ST Overview
description:
Buy LG 30 Cu Ft Stainless Steel Bottom Freezer Refrigerator - LMX30995SS - http://www.abt.com/product/73571/LG-LMX30995ST.html

Key Features:
• Super-Capacity (30 Cubic Feet)
• Door-in-Door™
• Double Freezer Drawers
• Slim SpacePlus™ Ice System
Features:
STYLE AND DESIGN
• 30 cu.ft.
• Door-in-Door
• Slim SpacePlus™ Ice System
• Premium Stainless Steel Finish
• Contoured Doors with Matching Commercial Handles
• Smart Pull™ Freezer Handle
• Hidden Hinges
• Premium LED Interior Light
ORGANIZATION
• 3 SpillProtector™ Tempered Glass Shelves/1 Folding Shelf
• Full Width Temperature-Controlled Glide N’ Serve™ Drawer
• 2 Humidity Crispers/1 Bonus Drawer
• 7 Door Baskets (2 Adjustable Gallon Size)
• DuraBase™ Solid Drawer Base
PERFORMANCE
• Smart Cooling Plus System
• Fresh Air Filter
• Dual Evaporators
• Linear Compressor for Better Energy Quiet Operation and Durability
• Multi-Air Flow
• Electronic Temperature Controls
• Tall Ice & Water Dispenser
• Premium Water Filtration System
• SmartDiagnosis™ System
• Door Alarm
• LoDecibel™ Quiet Operation
